title: Price Elasticity and Total Revenue of Stamps

content.question: The postmaster general of a country decides to double the price of first-class stamps, expecting the action to cause the revenues from sales of first-class stamps to double. What absolute value of price elasticity of demand is the postmaster general assuming in making the projection?

choices.label: Between <math alttext="0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>0</mn></math> and <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math>
